WSUS32 KKCI 270355 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 3C 
VALID UNTIL 0555Z 
KS 
60ENE HLC 
ISOL TS D30 MOV FROM 29020KT. TOPS TO FL350. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 270555-270955 
FROM INL-30W ODI-30W BUM-40NNE GCK-30E FSD-70NNW GFK-INL 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM
